H0.text: Which US president won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1920. Theodore Roosevelt

H1.text: Which US president won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1920. Herbert Hoover

H2.text: Which US president won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1920. Charles Evans Hughes

H3.text: Which US president won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1920. W. Wilson

A4.text: Wilson was awarded the 1919 Nobel Peace Prize for his role as founder of the League of Nations.

A6.text: Roosevelt won the 1906 Nobel Peace Prize

A7.text: Hoover was awarded an honorary doctorate by the Charles University in Prague and University of Helsinki in March 1938.
